strapiPost.title: A Piece Of Home
strapiPost.content:
The 5th annual military 12 Needs of Christmas fundraiser hosted by local non-profit Socks and Cookies is underway.

  • The mission: Socks and Cookies is a non-profit based in Rogers dedicated to providing troops deployed overseas in all military branches little pieces of home in care packages.
  • You can contribute: Items include: black crew socks, cookies, coffee/water packets, snacks, playing cards, and lip balm. Drop off locations are at the Socks and Cookies office, Cooper Realty, and Hartz Pet Company in Bentonville.

Click HERE for more information.
